item.title: Cookie Security, Wordle, and You
item.description: Sites that do not implement secure cookie handling can end up exposing sensitive data to attackers, so it’s important to know the basics around cookie hygiene. Read on to see how sites can secure these values, how you can check the security of these values, remove them when needed, and an extra bit on how to win at the popular Wordle word game the first time, every time!
